title: The Was
brief_description: The Was is a sampladelic trip through the neighborhoods of collective memory. Part experimental film and part music video, it is the collaborative meeting of Australian sample artists Soda_Jerk and The Avalanches.

constellations_other.name: Remix and resistance (Since I left you)
constellations_other.description: The Avalanches' music videos are part of a long artistic tradition of reappropriation as a means of reframing perception.
